description: Simplify event sign-ups with this comprehensive registration form.

steps.title: Welcome to Event Registration!
steps.text: Thank you for your interest in our event. To complete your registration and ensure everything is prepared for your participation, please fill out the form below with the necessary details.

blocks.label: Phone Number
blocks.help: Optional contact number for event-related updates.
blocks.name: phone

blocks.label: Organisation/Company
blocks.help: Name of the organisation or company (if applicable).
blocks.name: organization

blocks.label: Job Title/Position
blocks.help: The registrant's job title or position (if applicable).
blocks.name: position

blocks.label: Billing Address
blocks.help: The registrant's billing address information (if applicable).
blocks.name: billing_address

blocks.label: Special Requirements
blocks.help: Note any special requirements or accommodations needed.
blocks.name: special_requirements
